description: This file is a C header file declaring the interface functions for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Environment Controller (Env Controller). It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the TLS Env Controller.

methods.name: TlsCreateEnvController
methods.description: Prototype for creating the TLS Environment Controller object, takes container, owner, and reserved context handles.

methods.name: TlsEcoCreate
methods.description: Prototype for creating the TLS Eco object, takes container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: TlsEcoRemove
methods.description: Prototype for removing the TLS Eco object, takes a handle to the object.

methods.name: TlsEcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Prototype for enrolling objects within the TLS Eco, takes a handle to the object.

methods.name: TlsEcoInitialize
methods.description: Prototype for initializing the TLS Eco object, takes a handle to the object.
